title: Arhan’s data on medical knowledge
text:
Medical Data and LLMs
Where do they meet
Medical data analysis using large language models enables clinicians and researchers to extract insights from unstructured records, clinical notes, and research papers. LLMs support diagnosis assistance, risk prediction, cohort analysis, and decision support while improving efficiency, accuracy, and personalization in modern healthcare systems.

from IPython.display import display, Image
